mapper.select: select ss_p.id, ss_p.parent_id, ss_p.name, ss_p.level, ss_p.component, ss_p.sequence, ss_c.icon, ss_c.title, 1 `show` from sys_sitemaps ss_p left join sys_sitemaps ss_c on ss_c.id = ss_p.id and ss_c.is_deleted = 0 where ss_p.is_deleted = 0 order by ss_p.sequence

select ss_p.id, ss_p.parent_id, ss_p.name, ss_p.level, ss_p.component, ss_p.sequence, ss_p.icon, ss_p.title from sys_sitemaps ss_p where ss_p.is_deleted = 0
and ss_p.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ss_p.parent_id is null
order by ss_p.sequence

select ss.id, ss.parent_id, ss.name, ss.level, ss.component, ss.sequence, ss.icon, ss.title, ss.is_deleted, ss.sequence, 1 `show` from sitemap_action_authority saa join sys_sitemaps ss on ss.id = saa.sitemap_action_id and ss.is_deleted = 0 where saa.is_deleted = 0 and saa.authority_type = 'sitemap' and saa.is_authorised = 1 and ss.id = saa.sitemap_action_id
and saa.target_id in
#{id}
order by ss.sequence

select ss.id, ss.parent_id, ss.name, ss.title, ss.level, ss.component, ss.sequence,(case when saa2.sitemap_action_id is null then 0 else 1 end ) ss_isAuth, ss2.id ss2_id, ss2.parent_id ss2_parentId, ss2.name ss2_name, ss2.title ss2_title, ss2.level ss2_level, ss2.component ss2_commponent, ss2.sequence ss2_sequence, (case when saa.sitemap_action_id is null then null else 1 end ) ss2_isAuth, sa.id sa_id, sa.sitemap_id, sa.name sa_name, sa.title sa_titile, sa.description, sa.key, sa.area, sa.sequence sa_sequence, (case when saa3.sitemap_action_id is null then null else 1 end ) sa_isAuth from sys_sitemaps ss left join sys_sitemaps ss2 on ss2.is_deleted = 0 and ss2.parent_id = ss.id left join sitemap_action_authority saa on saa.sitemap_action_id = ss2.id and saa.target_id = #{targetId} and saa.authority_target_type = #{type} and saa.authority_type = 'sitemap' left join sitemap_action_authority saa2 on saa2.sitemap_action_id = ss.id and saa2.target_id = #{targetId} and saa2.authority_target_type = #{type} and saa2.authority_type = 'sitemap' left join sys_action sa on sa.is_deleted = 0 and sa.sitemap_id = ss2.id left join sitemap_action_authority saa3 on saa3.sitemap_action_id = sa.id and saa3.target_id = #{targetId} and saa3.authority_target_type = #{type} and saa3.authority_type = 'action' where ss.parent_id is null and ss.is_deleted = 0

select sa.id, sa.sitemap_id, sa.name, sa.title, sa.description, sa.key from sys_action sa join sitemap_action_authority saa on saa.is_deleted = 0 and saa.is_authorised = 1 and saa.authority_type = 'action'
and saa.target_id in
#{id}
where saa.sitemap_action_id = sa.id and sa.sitemap_id = #{sitemapId} and sa.is_deleted = 0 group by sa.id order by sa.sequence
mapper.update: update sys_sitemaps set parent_id = #{sysSitemaps.parentId}, name = #{sysSitemaps.name}, title = #{sysSitemaps.title}, level = #{sysSitemaps.level}, url = #{sysSitemaps.url}, sequence = #{sysSitemaps.sequence}, icon = #{sysSitemaps.icon} where id = #{sysSitemaps.id}
